column4: i can't get the dang (x/u)buntu 7.04 to install, it freezes completely right after the installer starts X. is there a way to log to a file the install process so i can find out wtf driver is causing it to stall?
Can you get to a terminal with ctrl+alt+F1 ( F7 to get back to X ) ?
nope, nothing works. numlocks button doesn't even work
i tried using the alternate installer for xubuntu as well, it froze too
